TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventBuilder

span.span: Defines events for a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Um `EventBuilder` sempre está associado com um `TypeBuilder`.An `EventBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. O método TypeBuilder.DefineEvent será retornado um novo `EventBuilder` a um cliente.The TypeBuilder.DefineEvent method will return a new `EventBuilder` to a client.
